definition: a whole (a thing or person) of the same kind or category as another
details:
noun
- a whole (a thing or person) of the same kind or category as another
= example: a whole (a thing or person) of the same kind or category as another
- an animal or plant that bears a relationship to another (as related by common descent or by membership in the same genus)
= synonyms: congeneric
- a minor chemical constituent that gives a wine or liquor its distinctive character
